ygData.subject: RE: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Borxx is in RunnyEye...but I have NEVER seen him drop those Runes. They are on Evil Eyes within RunnyEye, but havent seen them on her. Borxx drops the lens for
ygData.messageBody:
Borxx is in RunnyEye...but I have NEVER seen him drop those Runes. They are
on Evil Eyes within RunnyEye, but havent seen them on her. Borxx drops the
lens for the Staff of the Observers Quest...you may want to hunt the EEs in
RunnyEye...I've heard people shouting in the zone that they got runes off of
them =)

Lanadina

From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Re: Crafted Greaves

Also gonna need to find Borxx, since he drops one of the three peices I
hear. Where does he spawn, and how often?

Thanks again for everyone's assistance in the crafted quests!!
